Verses: 1 appozhudhu Soogiyanaana Pildhaadh Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 neengal Endhamattum Pechchugalai Mudikkaadhiruppeergal? Buththimaangalaayirungal; Naangalum Pesattum.
3 naangal Mirugangalaippola Ennappattu, Ungal Paarvaikkuth Theezhppaanavargalaayiruppaanen?
4 kobaththinaal Ummaiththaane Peerugira Umadhunimiththam Boomi Paazhaaippogumo? Kanmalai Thannidaththaivittup Perumo?
5 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Vilakku Anaindhupom; Avan Aduppin Neruppum Avindhupom.
6 avan Koodaaraththil Velichcham Andhagaarappadum; Avan Vilakku Avanudane Anaindhupom.
7 avan Belanaai Nadandha Nadaigal Kuraindhupom; Avan Aalosanai Avanai Vizhappannum.
8 avan Than Kaalgalinaal Valaiyil Adappattu, Valaichchikkalile Nadakkiraan.
9 kanni Avan Kudhikaalaip Pidikkum; Parigaarar Avanai Merkolvaargal.
10 avanukkaaga Surukku Tharaiyilum, Avanukkaagak Kanni Vazhiyilum Vaikkappattirukkiradhu.
11 sutrilumirundhundaagum Bayangarangal Avanaith Thidukkidappanni, Avan Kaalgalaith Thisaitheriyaamal Alaiyappannum.
12 avan Belanaip Pattini Thindrupodum; Avan Pakkaththil Kedu Aayaththappattu Nirkum.
13 adhu Avan Angaththin Balaththaip Patchikkum; Bayangaramaana Maraname Avan Avayavangalaip Patchikkum.
14 avan Nambikkai Avan Koodaaraththilirundhu Verode Pidungappadum; Adhu Avanai Bayangara Raajaavinidaththil Thuraththum.
15 avanukku Ondrumillaamarponadhinaal Bayangaram Avan Koodaaraththil Kudiyirukkum; Kandhagam Avan Vaasasthalaththinmel Thelikkappadum.
16 keezhe Irukkira Avan Vergal Azhindhupogum; Mele Irukkira Avan Kilaigal Pattuppogum.
17 avanai Ninaikkum Ninaippu Boomiyilirundhazhiyum, Veedhigalil Avan Perillaamarpogum.
18 avan Velichchaththilirundhu Irulil Thuraththividappattu, Poologaththilirundhu Thallundupovaan.
19 avan Janaththukkulle Avanukkup Puththiranum Illai Powththiranum Illai; Avan Veettil Meedhiyaayirukkaththakkavan Oruvanum Illai.
20 avan Kaalaththor Avan Naalukkaagath Thidukkittadhupola, Pinnadiyaarum Bramippaargal.
21 akkiramakkaaran Kudiyirundha Sthaanangal Ivaigaldhaan; Dhevanai Ariyaamarpon
